attributes.action: Allow hospital patients to view TV for free
attributes.additional_details:
I think that patients should be able to view TV or listen to the radio for free instead of paying obscene charges to these 3rd party companies that supply the tvs. Most patients will benefit a lot from this. Some patients find it impossible or very difficult to concentrate reading a book or magazine for a variety of reasons.

Having free TV will benefit patients as it makes their time in hospital go quicker and feel happier.
